root.welcome: Welcome to SIOX Smoke Control Setup
root.wantToImportOld: Enable buttons for SX:ACCESS (.scp) file import:
root.instructions:
The information is only stored in your local computer. Multiple projects kan be saved in the same file.
Either start from scratch (press NEW SETUP) or fetch your saved work from file by pressing OPEN SETUP FILE.
root.instructionsw: Remember to save often (press SAVE SETUP FILE) and ALWAYS before closing the web browser
root.instructionsSteps: Follow the numbered sections 1 - 4 below. Finish by using the buttons A - C in section 1
root.instructionsProject: Create a new project or edit an existing
root.instructionsSystem: A project can include one or more systems each using a SX:ACCESS or SX:NETLINK module, for example for floors or buildings
